forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 3C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 40F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 33F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around before midnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered later on. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some snow showers possible early with any snow changing to a few showers later. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and scattered snow showers will change to some rain showers through the day. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 36F. NW winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and freezing rain. High 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 36F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.
